Binding.Expression: LET $attachments := EBMS_GET_ATTACHMENTS(EFormType, RecordID, "Email Attachments"); RETURN ARRAY_LENGTH($attachments) > 0

Information.Text: Attachments have been removed from this record due to being attached longer than the maximum allowed duration.

Binding.Expression: LET $attachments := EBMS_GET_ATTACHMENTS(EFormType, RecordID, "Email Attachments"); RETURN ARRAY_LENGTH($attachments) > 0

Information.Text: Attachments have been removed from this record due to being attached longer than the maximum allowed duration.
Email attachments that exceed system file size limits or are not part of the file extension whitelist may not have been automatically brought into the system. Refer to mailbox for source of truth.

Label.Text: Any attachments on this record are deleted after 30 days. Ensure you store any attachments in your record management system.

Block.HeadingText: Attachments Removed - click to show details
